title: Sampler, 1700
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation, pearls
Technique: embroidered in two-sided cross, satin, and back stitches on plain weave foundation
description: At upper left, box with pattern bands and alphabet; upper right, religious motifs.  Lower field: floral motifs and monogram and date.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1700.
1700. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation, pearls
Technique: embroidered in two-sided cross, satin, and back stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-185.
